SEARCH
Package RequestSystem

Class NewRequestCreator

Object
NewRequestCreator
public class NewRequestCreator extends Object
The NewRequestCreator class is responsible for creating new stock replenishment requests for medications in the inventory. It allows pharmacists to submit requests for increasing stock along with additional notes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NewRequestCreator

      public NewRequestCreator(HashMap<String,Request> requestRecords)
      Constructs a NewRequestCreator with the given request records.
      Parameters:
      requestRecords - the map of existing request records, where the key is the request ID and the value is the corresponding Request object.

  • Method Details

    • createNewRequest

      public void createNewRequest(String pharmId)
      Allows the pharmacist to create a stock replenishment request. The method prompts the pharmacist to select a medication, specify the quantity, and provide any additional notes. The new request is added to the request records.
      Parameters:
      pharmId - the ID of the pharmacist creating the request.

    • generateRequestId

      private String generateRequestId()
      Generates a unique request ID based on the current number of requests in the system.
      Returns:
      a unique request ID in the format "REQ".
